alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Palm Beach County through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Belle Glade to 6 miles southeast of Fremd Village-Padgett Island to near Belle Glade Camp. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Belle Glade Camp and Fremd Village-Padgett Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
